attributes.action: delay any increase in the minimum wage until the country recovers from the current 'financial downturn".
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The minimum wage affects small business more than others.  Since its introduction it has risen steadily in line with inflation and the cost of living.  The country is now experiencing an unprecedented financial downturn.  Small business everywhere are closing and proprietors are seeing their dreams smashed.  One of the biggest expenditures for any business is its staff.  With less money 'coming in' a delay in increasing the minimum wage be a great relief to owners of small business everywhere
